description: Lists the data sources for a given API.

nested_items.name: dataSources
nested_items.description: The DataSource objects.

nested_items.name: dataSourceArn
nested_items.description: The data source Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the data source.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the data source.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the data source.

nested_items.name: serviceRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Identity and Access Management (IAM) service role Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the data source. The system assumes this role when accessing the data source.

nested_items.name: dynamodbConfig
nested_items.description: DynamoDB settings.

nested_items.name: tableName
nested_items.description: The table name.

nested_items.name: awsRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: useCallerCredentials
nested_items.description: Set to TRUE to use Amazon Cognito credentials with this data source.

nested_items.name: deltaSyncConfig
nested_items.description: The DeltaSyncConfig for a versioned data source.

nested_items.name: baseTableTTL
nested_items.description: The number of minutes that an Item is stored in the data source.

nested_items.name: deltaSyncTableName
nested_items.description: The Delta Sync table name.

nested_items.name: deltaSyncTableTTL
nested_items.description: The number of minutes that a Delta Sync log entry is stored in the Delta Sync table.

nested_items.name: versioned
nested_items.description: Set to TRUE to use Conflict Detection and Resolution with this data source.

nested_items.name: lambdaConfig
nested_items.description: Lambda settings.

nested_items.name: lambdaFunctionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Lambda function.

nested_items.name: elasticsearchConfig
nested_items.description: Amazon OpenSearch Service settings.

nested_items.name: endpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint.

nested_items.name: awsRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: openSearchServiceConfig
nested_items.description: Amazon OpenSearch Service settings.

nested_items.name: endpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint.

nested_items.name: awsRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: httpConfig
nested_items.description: HTTP endpoint settings.

nested_items.name: endpoint
nested_items.description: The HTTP URL endpoint. You can specify either the domain name or IP, and port combination, and the URL scheme must be HTTP or HTTPS. If you don't specify the port, AppSync uses the default port 80 for the HTTP endpoint and port 443 for HTTPS endpoints.

nested_items.name: authorizationConfig
nested_items.description: The authorization configuration in case the HTTP endpoint requires authorization.

nested_items.name: authorizationType
nested_items.description: The authorization type that the HTTP endpoint requires.

nested_items.name: awsIamConfig
nested_items.description: The Identity and Access Management (IAM) settings.

nested_items.name: signingRegion
nested_items.description: The signing Amazon Web Services Region for IAM authorization.

nested_items.name: signingServiceName
nested_items.description: The signing service name for IAM authorization.

nested_items.name: relationalDatabaseConfig
nested_items.description: Relational database settings.

nested_items.name: relationalDatabaseSourceType
nested_items.description: Source type for the relational database.

nested_items.name: rdsHttpEndpointConfig
nested_items.description: Amazon RDS HTTP endpoint settings.

nested_items.name: awsRegion
nested_items.description: Amazon Web Services Region for Amazon RDS HTTP endpoint.

nested_items.name: dbClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: Amazon RDS cluster Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: databaseName
nested_items.description: Logical database name.

nested_items.name: schema
nested_items.description: Logical schema name.

nested_items.name: awsSecretStoreArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Web Services secret store Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for database credentials.

nested_items.name: eventBridgeConfig
nested_items.description: Amazon EventBridge settings.

nested_items.name: eventBusArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the event bus. For more information about event buses, see Amazon EventBridge event buses.

nested_items.name: metricsConfig
nested_items.description: Enables or disables enhanced data source metrics for specified data sources. Note that metricsConfig won't be used unless the dataSourceLevelMetricsBehavior value is set to PER_DATA_SOURCE_METRICS. If the dataSourceLevelMetricsBehavior is set to FULL_REQUEST_DATA_SOURCE_METRICS instead, metricsConfig will be ignored. However, you can still set its value.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: An identifier to pass in the next request to this operation to return the next set of items in the list.
